name: The Idle Hand by JAFBO Studios [DEMO]
name_original: The Idle Hand by JAFBO Studios [DEMO]
description:
Have you ever wanted to create havoc and destruction? Do you like puzzles? Maybe you’re a fan of pop culture references? Then we have the game just for you! The Idle hand is an Isometric puzzler where you play as a disembodied hand sent by Satan. It is up to you to find the most optimal way to cause chaos in the bedroom of Jimmy and Timmy. Use The List to help you figure out what you need to destroy. After successfully solving the puzzle, you get rewarded with a fancy new skin which you can use on your hand. Finish all the lists and find the secret objectives to complete your mission. 


Controls:
WASD - move
Up and Down Arrows - fly up and down
Left and Right Arrows - swap skin
E - interact
Enter - select
